verses.name: Acts 3:15
verses.text: And killed the Prince of life, whom God hath raised from the dead; whereof we are witnesses.

verses.name: Acts 3:16
verses.text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong, whom ye see and know: yea, the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all.

verses.name: Acts 3:17
verses.text: And now, brethren, I wot that through ignorance ye did it, as did also your rulers.

verses.name: Acts 3:18
verses.text: But those things, which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets, that Christ should suffer, he hath so fulfilled.
